laboratory_examinations.findings: Sheets of large transformed cells with dysplastic nuclei, focal epidermotropism, and small lymphocytes with cerebriform nuclei. Immunohistochemistry stained positive for CD3 and UCHL-1 while a CD30 stained only a few scattered cells.
Large irregular lymphocytes that were CD3- and CD45RO-positive but CD30-negative, consistent with large T-cell lymphoma arising as transformed mycosis fungoides.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Gene rearrangement studies of the T-cell receptor gene
laboratory_examinations.findings: Failed to demonstrate a clonal T-cell population in the blood or skin.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Serologic and polymerase chain reaction testing for HTLV-I/II
laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for both husband and wife.
